response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great asset to you as well. Given its worth of $12,000 to you, I propose a special introductory price of $13,500. This offer allows you to experience the benefits of our product at a slightly higher value than its intrinsic worth to you, ensuring both satisfaction and a fair deal. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 13500}
